data.text: Storing Water during Winter Bikepacking

Anyone here bikepack in winter? I'm looking for ideas on how to carry water in temps down to -15C. It looks like one of the best options is Nalgene HDPE bottle in a 40below bottle parka. My best idea how to carry it is in a large Alpkit feeder bag. I'd love to find out how to carry a bottle below the frame though, where I have ample space for a 1.5l PET bottle in summer. Related, those of you who use a liquid fuel stove, any ideas on how to carry the bottle on the frame? I think I have enough clearance under the frame even with the 1.5l water bottle.
I use a steel thermos.
